txt.en:
'Among the crags to the east, a pack of Wargs have holed up in some warrens. From there, they hunt our patrols and harry our forces.

'I believe we should root out the Wargs and drive them from this place. It would make our movements easier and less noticed by the enemy, I think.

'The warren lies to the east, not far from the northern pass into the Gravenwood.'
'With the Warg-threat reduced, our patrols can scout more effectively and secretly.'
'Have you hunted down the Wargs yet?'
Garrun told you of a pack of Wargs holed up in some warrens east of his encampment.
The Warg-warren lies to the east from Garrun's camp.\n\nGarrun asked you to drive the Wargs from their warren in the Isendale.
Talk to Garrun in the Isendale
Garrun's camp is west of the Warg-warren.\n\nYou should return to Garrun with news of your success.
